text:
Hey everyone. When creating templates we can access certain parts of modules to change text like soâ€¦but how do we grab custom style tab options??

```{% module "hero-banner" path="/globalexpansion-2021/src/modules/hero-banner.module", label="Hero Banner", hero_content={'hero_heading': "Test"} %}```
Does anyone know if we can we add saved sections that are used on pages to blog templates?
if it is a module, then yes you can use it on blog template.
I'm hoping someone could shed some light on why none of the blog subscription instances (3, 4,or 5) appear in preview (or on any pages where they are used) while the other two modules do.

And yes, I did specify the default blog in version #5.

**UPDATE** 11/10/21 -  I was able to get example #5 to work today. Turns out you need to activate at least one Subscriber email notification in settings in order for the module to appear at all. Still not clear why #3&4 don't work.
